import React from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import img1 from './static/img/profile_img.JPG'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ base_top: { marginTop: '4vh', marginBottom: '3vh', backgroundColor: '#F2F2F2', }, text_content: { margin: theme.spacing(1.5), }, personal_info: { margin: theme.spacing(1.5), display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'nowrap', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-evenly', [theme.breakpoints.down('md')]: { flexDirection: 'column' }, }, })); export default function Top() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
STEVEN BI
FULL STACK DEVELOPER/SOFTWARE ENGINEER
Location: Perth WA, Australia
Github: github.com/Seven-Bi
Mobile: (061) 0450980608
Email: steven.bb.0221@gmail.com
Software Engineer with years of programming experiences in coding Python and core Java, passionate about web app development with Django ecosystem and Restful API design. Familiar with React, Ajax, Git and Docker.
); }
